attributes.action: Taxes to pay for pet healthcare
attributes.additional_details: As this involves taxes and financials, it would be the government who would be responsible for working out the logistics.
attributes.background: Our pets are being neglected in their healthcare needs due to the ridiculous costs of vet treatment. I would like for our taxes to pay towards pet healthcase, as our taxes pay towards NHS treatment for humans.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700344
